attributes.action: Sack the current Minister for Defence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As an ex member of HM Forces (RAF)I was led to believe that no current serving member of HM Forces were allowed under the Offical Secrets Act to publish or sell any stories relating to their current service in the Military. Therefore, I am calling for the Minister for Defence to be sacked by the PM for conduct unbecoming a Minister in regards to manipulating service personal for government gains and propagande.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
